changeSet.id: find and delete constraints from user client secret question response
changeSet.author: wlee
changeSet.sql: DELETE from user_client_secret_question_response where user_client_id IN ( SELECT DUP.user_client_id FROM ( SELECT user_client_id, secret_question_id, count(*) as c FROM user_client_secret_question_response group by user_client_id, secret_question_id having count(*) > 1 ) AS DUP )
